field_provus_body.value:
Public safety and ensuring the safety of residents, visitors, and their property is a top priority for both the county officials and residents themselves. Meridian County Public Safety Department (MCPSD) plays a crucial role in maintaining order, responding to emergencies, and delivering a wide range of services that for crime and accident prevention.

The department works to prevent crimes and accidents by providing educational programs and working proactively with community members to identify and address safety concerns.  This includes providing emergency services, such as police, fire and medical response, conducting investigations into crimes and accidents, and enforcing the law to ensure public safety.

The public safety department is an integral part of the community, and they strive to provide the best possible services to keep residents safe and secure.
